title: Ticket #3728: New test: condor_status -submitters reports correct numbers
description:
We need a new regression test to verify that #3713 (condor_status -submitters doubles running job count) doesn't reoccur.

Proposed test:

  1. Create an execute node with 2 cores.
  2. Submit 5 jobs. They should run indefinitely.
  3. Submit 1 job on hold.
  4. Wait for 2 jobs to be running.
  5. Run "condor_status -submitters" (possibly using -autoformat, -format, -long) and verify RunningJobs==2, IdleJobs==3, and HeldJobs==1
